Initial.title: Locha Mesh
Initial.subtitle: The Locha Mesh is an off-grid resilient network for communications, Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies payments, and data transmission without Internet.
Initial.text: Do you want to create a new account or restore a previously used account?

Initial.subtitleRestore: To restore your account with a backup phrase enter the words in the correct order.
